entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • error NU1903: Warning As Error: Package 'System.Private.Uri' 4.3.0 has a known high severity vulnerability, https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-xhfc-gr8f-ffwc #42651
  • Daily build: Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref with version (= 6.0.34) #42638
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/main` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #42637

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0.4xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42655
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Always print manifest versions in workload list command #42653
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Maybe permit users to find latest set versions #42652
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42650
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42649
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Replace obsolete nuget api in Microsoft.DotNet.PackageValidation" #42648
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Forward port: Fix .net8 template #42635
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • doco: Update wrong env var #42632
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • make error for workload info clean Fixes #42581 #42630
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • [main] use stage 2 MSBuild version instead of stage 0 for msbuild disjoint c… #42571
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [8.0.1xx] No .deps.json for net472 Container task #42317
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.9
  • Bump branding for 401 hotfix #42624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle Test Information from the New Testing Platform #42494
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [Web SDK] Avoid copying packages.lock.json to the output folder #42639
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42634
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42656
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • ResolvePackageReferences: PackageDependenciesDesignTime inherits transitive package DiagnosticLevel #42546
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request
  • Download rsync if using mariner #42628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Drop FirstTimeMessageAspNetCertificateLinux #42519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2512206 #42570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable BundleNativeAotCompiler for riscv64 architecture #42158
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement support for multi-process Hot Reload #41324
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
